title: Police assualting a demonstrator
description: Photographer's description: A protester is surrounded, beaten, and dragged away by plainclothes police. 17. Underneath the bridge behind the Egyptian Museum on the edge of Tahrir Square.
subject-lcsh: Demonstrations; Egypt; Police brutality; Protest movements; Revolutions
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
